parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

>  This UNIX timestamp must indicate a point in time that is accurate to the minute.

parameters.name: Interval
parameters.description: The sampling interval. Unit: seconds. The value must be a multiple of 60. Default value: 60. Unit: seconds. The query result varies depending on the sampling interval.

parameters.name: Ip
parameters.description: The IP address of the Anti-DDoS Proxy instance to query.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description:
The type of the service. Valid values:

*   **cn**: Anti-DDoS Proxy (Chinese Mainland)
*   **cn-hongkong**: Anti-DDoS Proxy (Outside Chinese Mainland)

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The beginning of the time range to query. The value is a UNIX timestamp. Unit: seconds.

>  This UNIX timestamp must indicate a point in time that is accurate to the minute.
